content: /*<![CDATA[*/ $('#title').html($('meta[name=map-description]').attr('content')); /*]]>*/ Trend Companion explains Observed Attack Techniques events in the Search app August 5, 2024—When using the Observed Attack Techniques search method in the Search app, you can learn more about the events detected in your environment with the help of Trend Companion. For more information, see Trend Companion. Agentic SIEM & XDR → XDR Data Explorer © 2025 Trend Micro Incorporated. All rights reserved.Search Knowledge Base
